ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
//获取最新章节链接
chapter=java.get('chapter');

//获取最新章节id
idnew=chapter.match(/(\d+)\.html/)[1];
//获取第一章id
id1=java.getString('@@tag.dd.0@tag.a@href',false).match(/(\d+)\.html/)[1];
//id相减获取页数
page=Math.ceil((idnew-id1)/100);

list=[];

//获取最新12章
list1=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.get('list')).select('a').toArray();

//循环加载下一页，拼接章节列表
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
html=java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/\d+\/$/,i+'/'));
dd=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('dd a').toArray();
list.push.apply(list,dd)
}

//删除最后8章（剃除错误的章节链接）
list.splice(-8,8);

//拼接最新12章
list=list.concat(list1);

//排序
list.sort().map(x=>x)
</js>

2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作

var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {

}

    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);

        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
JSON.parse(result).related.map(function(o) {
    var detail = 'https://reader.browser.miui.com/api/v2/book/' + o.id;
    var J = JSON.parse(java.ajax(detail)).data;
    return {
        name: o.title,
        author: o.author,
        tags: [J.bookInfo.bookStatus,J.bookInfo.secondCategoryName].join(','),
        num: J.bookInfo.wordCount + '字',
        latest: J.lastChapter.chapterName.replace(/[\(（].*[求更谢乐发推].*[）\)]/,'').replace(/\s+/g, ' ') +  String(java.timeFormat(J.lastChapter.updateTime)).replace(/(\d+\/\d+\/\d+).*/,'（$1）'),
        cover: o.image,
        intro: String(o.description).trim(),
        catalogUrl: '/api/v2/chapter/list/' + o.id
    }
}).filter(v =>v.name);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var o = selector =>String(J.select(selector).text());

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));

var book = {
      name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|（.*）/,''),

      author: og('novel:author'),

      kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/,''),

      latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/,''), 

      intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/,' ').replace(/\//g,'-') + '\n' + o('#intro p:eq(0)').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'\n'),

      cover: og('image'),

      url: og('novel:read_url'),
};

book;
</js>

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    latest: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      ),
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
      
    ].join(','),
    latest:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, '').replace(/^vip卷\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://book.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

' + booklist.content, last: '⭐'.repeat(booklist.score), url: '/api/book/' + book.bookId }; }); } else { data = data.map(function(o) { var intro = o.updateAt ? o.updateAt.slice(0, 3).replace(/1970.+/, '') : ''; return { name: o.title, author: o.author.replace(/_/g, '·').replace(/·出版/, ''), kind: [ o.tags.slice(0, 2).join('·'), o.status == 0 ? <js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total / pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  var index = list[i] + 1;
  list[i] = {
    name: '第' + index + '页',
    url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index
  };
}

var score = java.get('score');

if (list.length > 0 && score) {
  list[list.length - 1].name = score;
}

list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集/g,"︵")
.replace(/失败.*?浏览器！/g,"︶")
.replace(/chapter_c\(\);/,"")
</js>

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + o('.top').match(/状态：(.*)\s更/)[1].replace(/中|已/, ''),
  wordCount: o('.top').match(/字数：(.*)字/)[1],
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + o('.top').match(/时间：(.*)\s/)[1].replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|(各位书友|Tags).*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var book = {
	name: o('h2').match(/《(.*)》.*/)[1],
	author: o('h2').match(/.*作者：(.*)首发.*/)[1],
	kind: o('.bookIntro p strong:eq(0)') + ',' + o('.bookIntro strong:eq(1)').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: o('h4 b').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + o('h4').match(/.*\((\d+-\d+-\d+)\).*/)[1],
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + o('h4').match(/.*\((\d+-\d+-\d+)\).*/)[1] + '\n' + o('#newIntro').replace(/\[ .*\]/, ''),
	cover: J.select('.bookPic img').attr('src'),
	url: J.select('.viewTool a:eq(0)').attr('href'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#bookIntro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
  wordCount: o('.layui-bg-red').replace(/\s+万字/,'万'),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url').replace('m.','www.'),
};
book;
</js>

}];

	})
}

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(\+番外|全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var p = result.match(/共(\d+)页/)[1];
var list = [{
	t: '1',
	h: baseUrl
}];
for (var i = 2; i <= p; i++) {
	list.push({
		t: '' + i,
		h: baseUrl.replace(/\.html/, '_' + i + '.html')
	})
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var res = java.ajax( baseUrl.replace( /.+post\//, 'http://www.zxcs.me/content/plugins/cgz_xinqing/cgz_xinqing_action.php?action=show&id=' ) ); var voteTags = ['仙草', '粮草', '干草', '枯草', '毒草']; var vote = String(res) .split(',') .map((v, i) => ('🏷️' + voteTags[i] + ' ➣ ' + v + '人' + ' ').slice(0, 12)); var intro = String(J.select('#vote').text()) + '
' + String(J.select('p:contains(内容简介)').html()).replace(/.+】：/g, ''); '
' + vote.slice(0, 3).join(' ') + '
' + vote.slice(3).join(' ') + '
' + intro;

ruleContent.content:
var content; var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); content = String(J.select('.plus_l').html()) .replace('推荐级别 ：', '') .trim(); var downfile = J.select('.downfile a') .toArray() .map(a => '【' + a.text() + '】
' + a.attr('href')) .join('
'); content = [ content, downfile, '如果看不到下载链接，可以在右上对本源禁用“替换净化”。' ].join('
━━━━━
'); content;

最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/\s.*/,'') + '\n' + String(J.select('.con').html()).replace(/.*简介：|各位书友.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
  wordCount: parseInt(o('#cms_ready_1')/10000) + '万',
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.words').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name
